item.title: Comment on Tuesday assorted links by Clay
item.description:
1) Here in DC a church is one of few places where I could walk in the door and speak to a somewhat big deal political appointee where we’re on equal footing and treat each other with a reasonable amount of decency and concern. The idea of a place where there’s an expectation of equality, decency and benevolence to interactions between everyone there is pretty powerful.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/07/tuesday-assorted-links-473.html?commentID=160779633
